General.Name: Alpha Trust Mutual Fund and Alternative Investment Fund Management S.A
General.Description: Alpha Trust Mutual Fund and Alternative Investment Fund Management S.A. is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm primarily provides its services to private and institutional investors. It also manages accounts for corporate, ultra high net worth individuals, insurance companies, and pension funds. The firm offers client focused equity, fixed income, and balanced portfolios. It also launches and manages equity, fixed income, and balanced mutual funds and hedge funds for its clients. The firm invests in the public equity, fixed income, and alternative markets across the globe with a focus on Greece. It employs quantitative and qualitative fundamental analysis to make its investments. Alpha Trust Mutual Fund and Alternative Investment Fund Management S.A. was founded in 1987 and is based in Kifissia, Greece.
